name: The Humble Shopkeeper
description:
Story

You are a humble shopkeeper who has many adventurers who comes and goes from your little home. You see many different faces each day, and you have plenty of stock to offer them.

Controls

Use WASD for moving around, and E to interact with objects.

Comments

This was made for the AAU JAM game jam, where the theme was "You don't play the main character". We took the theme in a direction of where the main characters are taken in the context of the story, where you yourself is just an NPC character who sells items to the main characters who visit your humble shop.

There are a few missing features and a few glitch spots to get into, but you are able to get out with ease. If there are any bugs you come upon that we have not noticed, please leave them in the comment.

We recommend playing the game at least twice as well as looking around for the 3 hidden easter eggs in the game, two of which you have to utilize the buggy mechanics of the game in order to find. Happy hunting gamers!

Credit
